dialogues.text: At night, the stars shimmer brightly above Shamrock Town. There's little interference from other light sources around here.

options.text: Have you seen anything unusual lately?

dialogues.text: Well, last night I saw a bunch of strange men roaming the town square.

options.text: Did you see where they went?

dialogues.text: I'm sorry. It's unlikely that they were from around, I didn't recognize them. Perhaps somebody saw them passing by as they left?
